name: The Mirage Seers
description: Hailing from the Dunes of Kathoon, the The Mirage Seers owe a debt of gratitude to the Groodu for deliverance in their time of need. Now working as diviners - those who navigate the dreams of others in order to heal mental afflictions, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
